He then spent a year investigating and interviewing the team of experts across the country who worked as advocates for the dogs and their rehabilitation. Fighting dogs, especially pit bulls, are almost always considered beyond help and euthanized. So this was a landmark legal decision to allow a team of experts to come in and attempt to restore the unimaginable damage inflicted upon these dogs. The rehabilitation of Michael Vick 's dogs was kept secret at first, even though his trial gained national attention, in order to protect the dogs from thieves of the dog fighting underworld. to speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google Inc. said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google Inc. stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said.
